### Load the data
```{r, load_data}
dfolder <- "/data/processing1/bioinfo_core/requests/FANCI_RNA_seq_4stresses/analysis_fastq_free_trim_gtffilter/"
```

### Read in the RDS object with the sleuth values
```{r, read_RDS}

sleuth_live(so)
```
